title: Amazon Seller Suspended Account Specialist
job_overview:
Location: Remote
Schedule: Philippines Night Shift – 8AM to 5PM PHT, Monday to Friday
Compensation: $900–$1,400/month (depending on experience)
Position Type: Full-Time

About the Role:
We’re looking for an experienced Amazon Suspended Account Specialist to join our team. This role requires someone with proven experience in reinstating suspended Amazon seller accounts and resolving a variety of account health issues including blocked listings, all types of violations, A-Z claims, and negative feedback.

Key Responsibilities:

Take full ownership of assigned tickets and resolution workflows.

Draft and submit strong appeals to Amazon for a Seller Account or ASIN reinstatement.

Troubleshoot and resolve violations, A-Z claims, negative feedback, and other health-related issues.

Communicate with Amazon Seller Support and escalate cases when necessary.

Collaborate with our internal teams via Slack & Zoho Projects.

Qualifications:

Minimum 2 years experience successfully reinstating suspended Amazon seller accounts.

Deep understanding of Amazon Seller Central and Account Health policies.

Strong written English and analytical thinking skills.

Must be available to work Philippines night shift (8AM–5PM PHT, Monday to Friday).

Quiet, distraction-free workspace with reliable internet.

Familiarity with tools like Zoho Projects, Slack, Salesforce, and Google Workspace is a plus.

Why Join Us?

Competitive monthly salary based on experience.

Fast-paced and growth-oriented environment.

Direct impact on our clients' success.

Work with a team that values excellence and accountability.

To Apply:
Please send your resume and written responses to the following three screening questions.

?? Important: Your answers must reflect your own knowledge and experience. Do not use AI tools (such as ChatGPT) to generate responses. We’re looking for real, hands-on expertise — not copied or artificial content. Candidates who submit generic or AI-generated answers will be immediately disqualified.

What are the key components of an effective Plan of Action (POA) for a suspended ASIN due to a “Used Sold as New” complaint?

If an account receives multiple A-Z Guarantee claims in a short period, what steps would you take to protect the Account Health rating and avoid suspension?

Explain the difference between an Intellectual Property violation and a Product Authenticity complaint on Amazon — and how you would approach resolving each one.
